hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo 'export PATH=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.7.0-openjdk-amd64/bin:$PATH;export USER=$(whoami);source build/envsetup.sh;lunch android_x86_64-userdebug;make iso_img -j16' | /bin/bash
mkdir -p "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID"
cp out/target/product/x86_64/boot/efi/boot/grub.cfg "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID" cp bootable/newinstaller/install/grub2/efi/boot/bootia32.efi "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID" cp bootable/newinstaller/install/grub2/efi/boot/bootx64.efi "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID" cp out/target/product/x86_64/ramdisk.img "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID" cp out/target/product/x86_64/initrd.img "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID" cp out/target/product/x86_64/install.img "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID" cp out/target/product/x86_64/system.sfs "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID" cp out/target/product/x86_64/kernel "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID" cp out/target/product/x86_64/android_x86_64.iso "/var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/$BUILD_ID"
test -e /var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/current && rm /var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/current ln -s $BUILD_ID /var/www/html/snapshot/$JOB_BASE_NAME/current
